CommandDefinition.Name: setmonlvl
CommandDefinition.Description: Sets the monitoring code for one ordertype, thereby overwriting the default value.

Argument.Name: orderType
Argument.Description: The ordertype for which the monitoring level is supposed to be set

Argument.Name: code
Argument.Description: The new monitoring code for the specified ordertype. Valid values are 0, 5, 10, 15 and 20.

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: The name of the application containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: The version name of the application containing the ordertype.

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: The name of the workspace containing the ordertype.
